attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Cyclists need decent cycle paths and it would encourage more people to get out and on there bikes if proper pathways for cyclists were created.

Cycle paths should be built in every city for more than just a few hundred yards.

Going out riding a bike in the U.K is extremely dangerous, I have nearly been hit by other road users on several occasions.

I therefore urge the government to help make it safer for cyclists and make cycling in the U.K a pleasurable ride rather than a dangerous Russian Roullette of a ride!

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
